title: News24.com | WATCH | ‘Stay safe for 21 days, we’ll all be alright, we’re going to heaven’ - homeless man
description: Thabo May, a homeless man who sleeps on a bench at the Sea Point promenade in Cape Town, says he is waiting for the police to take him to a place of safety.
content:
28 March, 09:44 PM
Thabo May is a homeless man who sleeps on a bench at the Sea Point promenade in Cape Town. 
He told News24 on Saturday he was waiting for police to pick him up and take him to a place of safety.
He was one of a few homeless people left o… [+268 chars]
